extension.summary: Import YouTube channels into your Kodi TV Show or Music Video library.
extension.description: Add channels and playlists from YouTube to Library as TV-shows or Music Videos.[CR]1. You'll need a YouTube API key for this to work, a good guide would be:[CR]https://github.com/anxdpanic/plugin.video.youtube/wiki/Personal-API-Keys[CR]If you have set custom api key for YouTube addon you should be able to skip this part.[CR]2. Set Video Source (in Kodi -> Media -> Library -> Videos -> Add Videos)[CR]- FOR Video Channels: special://profile/library/series[CR]- FOR Music Videos: special://profile/library/music_videos[CR]- Setting for Information Provider choose: LOCAL
